metadata.title: CVE-2016-10711 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Apsis Pound before 2.8a allows request smuggling via crafted headers, adifferent vulnerability than CVE-2005-3751.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10711` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

pound - 2.6-3ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: pound package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.6-3ubuntu0.1~esm1').
